name: knit four points baby blanket
notes:
materials
- 4 (8) skeins of purl sohoâ€™s [linen quill][2], 50% fine highland wool, 35% alpaca, and 15% linen. each skein is 439 yards/ 100 grams; approximately 360 (810) yards required per color. we used pale oats, lavender opal, heirloom white, and oatmeal gray.
- us 3 (3.25 mm), 32-inch [circular needles][3]

gauge
26 stitches and 52 rows = 4 inches in garter stitch

size
crib size (throw size)
finished dimensions: approximately 36 x 36 inches (52 x 52 inches)


  [2]: https://www.purlsoho.com/linen-quill.html
  [3]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools/knitting-needles.html?type_filter=881
